thread.section_title: Toddler Found Wandering Streets Of Van Nuys – CBS Los Angeles
thread.title: Toddler Found Wandering Streets Of Van Nuys
thread.title_full: Toddler Found Wandering Streets Of Van Nuys

author: Ftanyos
title: Toddler Found Wandering Streets Of Van Nuys
text:
VAN NUYS (CBSLA.com) – Police are searching for the parents of a little girl who was found alone in the streets of Van Nuys Tuesday evening.
At 6:41 p.m., LAPD Capt. Lillian L. Carranza posted photos of the girl on Twitter. According to Carranza, the child was found in the 7200 block of Kester Avenue, near Sherman Way.
The girl was described as between 2 and 3 years of age, with brown hair and brown eyes.
A news conference was scheduled for 8 p.m.
